com.ooyala.android.player

Interface PlayerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdMoviePlayer, BaseStreamPlayer, ExoMoviePlayer, MoviePlayer, Player, StreamPlayer, VASTAdPlayer

    public interface PlayerInterface
    The interface that must be implemented in order to receive control events from Ooyala UI

    • Method Summary

        int buffer()
        Returns:
        the buffer percentage (between 0 and 100 inclusive)

      • seekable

        boolean seekable()
        Returns:
        true if the current player is seekable, false if there is no current player or it is not seekable

      • seekToTime

        void seekToTime(int timeInMillis)
        Move the playhead to a new location in seconds with millisecond accuracy
        Parameters:
        timeInMillis - time in milliseconds

      • getState

        OoyalaPlayer.State getState()
        This returns the player state
        Returns:
        the state

      • livePlayheadPercentage

        int livePlayheadPercentage()
        Returns:
        the percentage of the cursor should be on scrubber for live stream playback

      • seekToPercentLive

        void seekToPercentLive(float percent)
        Seek to the given percent position of scrubber for live stream playback
        Parameters:
        percent - The percent of scrubber the cursor ends after seek

      • isLiveClosedCaptionsAvailable

        boolean isLiveClosedCaptionsAvailable()
        Returns:
        true if the player can support live closed captions

      • setClosedCaptionsLanguage

        void setClosedCaptionsLanguage(java.lang.String language)
        Set the displayed closed captions language.
        Parameters:
        language - 2 letter country code of the language to display or nil to hide closed captions

      • getError

        OoyalaException getError()

        Set the volume for the player.

      • getPlayerType

        PlayerType getPlayerType()
        Get the player's type.

      • isMultiAudioAvailable

        boolean isMultiAudioAvailable()
        Returns:
        true if the current asset has several audio tracks

      • createBitmapScreenshot

        void createBitmapScreenshot(com.ooyala.android.player.exoplayer.PlayerBitmapListener playerBitmapListener)
        Create the bitmap screenshot of the current video frame
        Parameters:
        playerBitmapListener - the interface that must be implemented in order to receive bitmap screenshot from Ooyala ExoPlayer
